attributes.action: The people have no confidence in the Government and demand an election.
attributes.additional_details: Call an immediate general election if the people show a desire for it by declaring no confidence in this current government which has repeatedly under different leaders misled the public. Let the people decide if this government deserve another chance, not trust them blindly to continue and potentially worsen the current struggles facing our country.
attributes.background: Mr Sunak was fined for lockdown breaches. He supported Johnson while it suited. There is no integrity to his leadership (as promised) demonstrated by his choice of Home Secretary. In my opinion in trade for leadership election support. Let him stand in an election and let the British give a mandate.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
